title: Whisky and chilli tiger prawns
description: This is best served as a starter. Sucking the sweet sauce off the juicy crustaceans is an experience to be savoured, never hurried. Shelled and unshelled prawns are both fine to use. Serve with a green salad and hunks of crusty bread.
serves: Serves 4 as a starter or 2 as a main course
ingredients: 2 limes, 1 juice and zest, 1 juice only
1 red chilli, seeds removed, finely chopped
